DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim measure effect green tea extract , tyrosine caffeine energy expenditure , appetite rating spontaneous energy intake together record side effect healthy normal weight subject .
DOC.brief_title: B181 : Stimulation Thermogenesis Bio-Active Food Ingredients
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Long-term weight maintenance weight loss often unsuccessful . Often weight regain observed study could indicate subject able change eat habit . There need simple safe method prevent weight gain re-gain i.e . increase thermogenesis decrease spontaneous energy intake ( EI ) . Studies show nutritional food-related non-nutritional factor influence adjustment EI EE compound enhance diet-induced thermogenesis ( DIT ) suppress appetite . Method : The present study design 4-way crossover , randomise , placebo control , dou-ble-blind study . Each treatment separate > 3 washout period . All treatment administer tablet contain either 500 mg green tea extract ( whereof 125 mg cate-chins ) , 400 mg tyrosine , 50 mg anhydrous caffeine , placebo . test day body weight composition assess . All participant underwent 4.5-h assessment energy expenditure indirect calorimetry ventilate hood . Energy intake record ad libitum pasta salad brunch serve last hood measurement Subjects : Twelve healthy lean ( 20 < BMI < 25 ) weight stable non-smoking subject 18-40 year age test 4 time wash-out period least 3 day .
DOC.criteria: Twelve healthy normalweight men ( age : 23.72.6 , BMI : 22.41.8 kg/m2 ) participate study . They weight stable ( within 3kg last 3 mo ) , nonsmoking , nonathletic , use dietary supplement frequent use medication .
